text: D. D. Lewis may refer to: * D. D. Lewis (linebacker, born 1945), played college football for Mississippi State University and in the National Football League for the Dallas Cowboys * D. D. Lewis (linebacker, born 1979), played college football for University of Texas and in the National Football League for the Seattle Seahawks and Denver Broncos * Daniel Day-Lewis, English actor ==See also== * Lewis (surname)
title: D. D. Lewis
